title: Glommer's Flower
summaries: The Glommer's Flower is a pet-summoning item which summons a Glommer pet that follows the player around. It is dropped by Derpling with a 1*1/100 (1%) chance. In a Constant world, the drop chance is increased to 2.5*1/40 (2.5%).

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a Glommer
'The petals shimmer in the light'
statistics.Sell: 5
